src_text: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
ref_text: “Como tenimus sòrighes de bator meses non diabèticos chi in antis fiant diabèticos”, at annantu.
hyp_text: "Abiemos de 4 meses de robbios chi sunt non-diabèticos chi aiant essidos diabèticos", agiungit.

src_text: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src_text: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ref_text: Comente àteras pessones espertas, issu tenet dudas subra de chi su diabete si podat curare, annotende chi custas chircas non serbint pro pessones chi tenent giai su diabete de Tipu 1.
hyp_text: Comente atras ispertos, ellu est scèpticu pro si diabete siat curadu, notende ca custos achentos no tenent rellevàntzia pro is persones chi jà tenent s’ispetzifigatzione 1 de diabete.

src_text: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ref_text: Dae NSA, aiat agiudadu Carter a manigiare in manera diplomàtica afàrios mondiales, comente sos acòrdios de Camp David, 1978; sa normalizatzione de sas relatziones USA-Cina a sa fine de sos annos 1970; sa rivolutzione Iraniana, chi aiat batidu a sa crisi iraniana de sos secuestrados, 1979; e s’invasione soviètica de s’Afganistan, 1979.
hyp_text: Comente NSA, el aiutadu Carter a resoltu a puntu diplomaticos de sas cosas mundiales, comente s’Accòrdios de Camp David, 1978; su normalizatzione de sas relatziones US–China aghinas a su 1978; sa Rivolutzione iraniana, chi aiat fatu a sa crisi de sos ostaggi iranianos, 1979; e sa invasione sovietica in Afganistana, 1979.

src_text: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

hyp_text: Carchi sa barba de su dinosàuru non at unu ràchis ben prus disvilupadu, ma at àteras caraterìsticas de sa barba – sas barbules – sas archeologas infèrren chi su ràchis est istadu un’abarramentu evolutzionale chi est istadu posteriore a custas àteras caraterìsticas.

src_text: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."
ref_text: “[Wales] nos aiat naradu fàulas dae su cumintzu. Primu, faghende comente si fiat pro resones legales. Segundu, faghende finta de nos iscurtare, finas a s’eliminatzione sua de arte.”
hyp_text: "He [Wales] deo duncas mentiri a nos dae su cumintzu. Prima, cun un’atere de si, cando est istadu comente si fiat pro motivos legales. Segundu, cun un’atere de si d’essere duncas de nos, fintzas a su momentu de s’artu de su deletu."

src_text: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref_text: “Sa conduta tèrmica issoro no est istàbile comente in sas rutas mannas de sa Terra, chi poderant una temperatura costante, ma est sìmile prus a cussa de foradas fundas in sa terra,” at naradu Glen Cushing de s’Iscuadra de Astrogeologia de sa United States Geological Survey (USGS) e de s’Universidade de Northern Arizona, de Flagstaff, Arizona.
hyp_text: Sa sas noas no sunt istables comente sas grotas prus mannas de sa Terra chi mantent in modu costante sa temperadura, ma sunt comente isas esserent agòllas prus profundas de terra, d’acordu cun Glen Cushing de su Team de Astrogeologia de sa United States Geological Survey (USGS) e de sa Northern Arizona University locada in Flagstaff, Arizona.

src_text: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
ref_text: Dae su 1988, sas urnas depent èssere trasparentes pro chi sos votantes e sos osservadores potzant testimoniare chi non b’at bustas a su cumintzu de su votu e peruna busta s’agiunghet a parte de cussas de sos votantes contados e autorizados in manera regulare.

src_text: City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination.

hyp_text: Is istados de sa tzitade sunt is precuridores de is natziones. Una cultura de su civile implìcit su trasmitere de sa notìtzia a prus de una genera, unu puntu culturale chi dura e una dissemminatzione equa.

src_text: Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts.

hyp_text: Su Conghressu non teniat aicò s’apoderi de impreare impostos, e, ca non bi biat un’executivu natzionale o unu giuditziale, s’at fiant a sos autoridades de sos istados, chi a bortas non si fiant cooperadores, pro a faghere totu sos sos actos.

src_text: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
ref_text: Sos Artìculos rechediant cunsensu unànime de totu sos istados in antis de èssere retificados e sos istados teniant gasi pagu contu de su guvernu tzentrale chi sos rapresentantes issoro medas bortas fiant assentes.
hyp_text: Sos Articulos no podiant esser cunsentidos dae totus sos istados e cando esser cunsentidos, sas istados pigiada su gobiernu centrali in modu legheru e sa noa presentatzione de sos representantes de sas istados no fiat assentida.

src_text: They were compelled to pay taxes to the U.S. colonial regime to defray a major part of the expenditures and the interest on bonds floated in the name of the Philippine government through the Wall Street banking houses.
ref_text: Fiant custrintos a pagare sas impostas a su regìmene coloniale de sos U.S.A. pro li torrare sa majoria de sas ispesas e s’interessu in obligatziones nche fiat crèschidu in nùmene de su guvernu filipinu pro mèdiu de sas bancas de Wall Street.
hyp_text: Ios fiant obligados a pàgare is tasas a su regnu coloniale de sos Istados Unidos pro azer pagare una parte manna de is dispendios e de is interessos de is bondes fletados in su nùmeni de su guvernu filipinu a meios de is bancares de Wall Street.

src_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
ref_text: Determinismu tecnològicu est unu cuntzetu chi imprassat una banda manna de ideas pràticas, dae sa tecnologia de ispinta o s'imperativu tecnològicu a unu sentidu istrintu chi su destinu umanu est ghiadu dae una lògica sutaistante assotziada cun sas leges iscientìficas e sa manifestatzione issoro in sa tecnologia.
hyp_text: Sa determinatzione tecnològica est unu termine chi abarrat a totu un’ampiu raigu de is ideas in pràtica, dae su push tecnològicu o su mandadu tecnològicu a unu sensu rigoriu chi sa nostra destina est manovrada dae una logica subraimpontada assoziada cun is leis cientìficas e sas manifestatziones suas in s’istitutu de sa tecnologia.

src_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
ref_text: S'in prus de sas interpretatziones de su determinismu tecnològicu cumpartzint duas ideas: chi s'isvilupu de sa tecnologia etotu sighit unu caminu chi propassat s'influèntzia culturale o polìtica, e chi sa tecnologia pro parte sua tenet "efetos" in sas sotziedades chi sunt de nàschida, prus chi cunditzionados dae sa sotziedade.
hyp_text: Sos intèrpretos prus frequentes de sa determinatzione tecnològica comente faghet a cunsiderare duas ideas generales: chi su desenvolumentu de sa tecnològica a s’iscola a unu caminu prus o minore de totu fàghet a sa cultura o sa politica, e chi sa tecnològica in s’iscola a ateros sòtzios chi sunt inerentes, in manera chi non sunt conditzionados de sos sòtzios.

src_text: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
ref_text: In su cuntestu de su Romantitzismu, sa geografia aiat dadu forma a sos indivìduos, e in su codale de su tempus sos costùmenes e sa cultura ligados a custa geografia nde sunt essidos a campu, e custos, dae chi fiant in armonia cun su logu e sa sotziedade, fiant mègius de sas leges impostas in manera arbitrària.
hyp_text: In su contestu de su romanticismu, sa geografia faghiat sas persones, e a pustis de tempus sa costumària e sa cultura relada a sas geografias si aghent formadu, e sas duas, essentes in harmònia cun su logu de sa sosietate, erant prus bènnas de is leis arbitràriament impreadas.

src_text: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.

src_text: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
ref_text: Pro cussu sos pitzinnos sunt narados “agrestes”. Unos cantos pitzinnos agrestes ant tentu restritziones dae persones (a su sòlitu sos genitores etotu); in carchi casu custu abbandonu fiat dèpidu a su refudu de sos genitores de un’invalididade grae fìsica e mentale.
hyp_text: Custos bocas sunt aitas "ferales" o "sos de sa selva". Some feral children sunt istados confinados dae sa gente (usualmente sos bocas); in certos casos custu abandonu de bocas est istadu dae su refùs de sos bocos de sa gente de su refùs de unu bocu de ispertzaduras o fisicas.

src_text: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
ref_text: Su de s’impalcadura no est unu mètodu de imparu ma prus a prestu un’agiudu chi frunit suportu a sos indivìduos chi sunt in mesu de un’esperièntzia noa de imparu comente a su de impreare unu programma nou de s’elaboradore o su de cumintzare unu progetu nou.
hyp_text: Su scaffolding non est unu metodu de iscola, ma pius unu ajutu chi daret su sostegnu a is persones chi faghent unu nou experientzia de iscola, comente cando duncas imparant a fagher unu nou programma de ordinadore o incumentzant unu nou progetu.

src_text: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.

src_text: Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top.

hyp_text: Est claru cuncretu chi su mundu at mutadu prus e prus pro su progressu de sa scienza e de sas tecnologias de sa gènere umana, e sos problemas sunt istados faghende prus e prus pro su superpopulatzione e pro su modu de vida extravagantziu de sa gènere umana.

src_text: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.
ref_text: Sa tzitade moderna de Casablanca fiat istada fundada dae sos piscadores bèrberos in su de 10 sèculos a.C., e impreada dae Fenìtzios, Romanos e sos Merinides comente portu istratègicu numenadu Anfa.

hyp_text: Su tèudore de sas telefònias locales podet dare prus informatziones in su connèssere a custu servìtziu.
prompt:

[Sardinian]: Mancari gasi, totu sos belgas e isvìtzeros chi faeddant frantzesu diant àere dèpidu imparare su frantzesu istandard in s’iscola, tando ti diant dèpere pòdere cumprèndere fintzas si impreas su sistema de nùmeros frantzesu istandard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Sardinian]: In sos sèculos, sa gente at fraigadu cun atentzione terratzas in su territòriu àsperu e ràbisu pròpiu subra de sas rocas chi s’afatzant a su mare.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Sardinian]: 800 mìglios de s’oleodotu Trans-Alaska sunt istados serrados a pustis de sa pèrdida de mìgias de bariles de petròlio grezu a sud de Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

hyp_text: Sos ispetziales Baltic Cruises sunt in su totu ispetziales de St. Petersburg, in Rùssia.

src_text: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
ref_text: Carchi crotzera includet Berlinu, in Germània, in sos libereddos. Comente podes bìdere dae sa mapa subra Berlinu non b’at mare acanta e una bìsita in sa tzidade no est inclùdida in su prètziu de sa crotzera.
hyp_text: Sas crozadas in s’istòria de su mundu ant cumprèndidu totu s’Oceànu Atlànticu. In su 1492 Cristòforu Colombe faghet su primu viàgiu de s’Oceànu Atlànticu, in su 1519-1522 Magellàn faghet su primu viàgiu intorno de su mundu, e in su 1778-1780 James Cook faghet su primu viàgiu austràliu.

[Sardinian]: Mancari gasi, totu sos belgas e isvìtzeros chi faeddant frantzesu diant àere dèpidu imparare su frantzesu istandard in s’iscola, tando ti diant dèpere pòdere cumprèndere fintzas si impreas su sistema de nùmeros frantzesu istandard.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Sardinian]: In sos sèculos, sa gente at fraigadu cun atentzione terratzas in su territòriu àsperu e ràbisu pròpiu subra de sas rocas chi s’afatzant a su mare.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Sardinian]: 800 mìglios de s’oleodotu Trans-Alaska sunt istados serrados a pustis de sa pèrdida de mìgias de bariles de petròlio grezu a sud de Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Sardinian]: Sas partes chi oe sunt de su Bèlgiu in antis faghiant parte de su Lussemburgu ma sunt coladas a su Bèlgiu a pustis de sa Rivolutzione belga de su 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Sardinian]: Dae su cumintzu, The Onion est istada a beru un’imperu de sa parodia de sas noas, cun un’editzione imprentada, unu situ cun 5000000 bisitadores solos in su mese de Ledàmine, annùntzios personales, unu canale 24 oras de noas, podcast, e un’atlante de su mundu publicadu dae pagu, numenadu Our Dumb World.
